summary: The story of Scotty Pelk, a socially inept video store clerk who gets fired from his job and becomes a sensation as an online film critic.
cast: Melik Malkasian|Ritah Parrish|John Breen|Dennis Adkins|Tara Walker|Taylor Nida|Daphne Carver|Kristen Torrianni|Michelle Garner|Michael Ramirez|Jack Ryan|Kim Hill|Tyler Gannon|Leslie Taylor|Tony St. Clair|Andrew Harris|Ezra Daniels|Matt Mitchum|Norther Mallinson|Kai Ness|S.E. Dogaru|Joe Hill|Byrd McDonald|Isaac Foust|Lora Ewers|Jason Hughes|David F. Walker|Katie Jones|Jayanta Jenkins|Becca Glatt|Whitney Kilian|D.K. Holm|Shawn Levy|Jacob Pander|Angi Moss
title: Film Geek
